tenantsManagement.title: Restaurant Management
tenantsManagement.description: Create and manage restaurant accounts on the platform

noTenants.title: No restaurants registered yet
noTenants.description: Start by adding the first restaurant to the platform

noTenant.description: No restaurant account associated with this user was found
noTenant.contactAdmin: Please contact the general manager to set up the restaurant account

shareableLink.title: Shareable Menu Link
shareableLink.description: Share this link with your customers to display the digital menu.

menu.title: Menu Management
menu.description: Add and edit items and categories

qr.title: QR Code
qr.description: Download and print the QR code for the menu

gettingStarted.title: Quick Start Guide
gettingStarted.description: Follow these steps to set up your digital restaurant menu

step1.title: Create Menu Categories
step1.description: Start by adding categories like "Grills" and "Appetizers"

step2.title: Add Items
step2.description: Add dishes with prices, images, and descriptions

step3.title: Customize Design
step3.description: Upload the restaurant logo and choose the appropriate colors

step4.title: Print QR Code
step4.description: Get the QR code and place it on the restaurant tables

qr.title: Digital Menu QR Code
qr.description: Generate and download the QR code for the restaurant

card.title: QR Code
card.description: Scan this code to access the menu for {{restaurantName}}

menuUrl.title: Menu URL
menuUrl.description: Customers can also access the menu directly via this link

step1.title: Print the Code
step1.description: Save or print the QR code in a suitable size (at least 5x5 cm is recommended)

step2.title: Place the Code
step2.description: Place the code on restaurant tables or near the entrance

step3.title: Scan and Order
step3.description: Customers scan the code with their phone camera and order via WhatsApp

tips.title: Important Tips
tips.tip1: Make sure the code is clear when printing
tips.tip2: Place the code where customers can easily access it
tips.tip3: Save a digital copy of the code for future use
tips.tip4: You can create different sizes for different uses

print.title: QR Code
print.subtitle: Digital Menu
print.instructionsLine1: Scan this code with your phone's camera

hero.title: Digital Menu Platform for Restaurants
hero.subtitle: Transform your restaurant into a complete digital experience with smart menus and WhatsApp orders

features.title: Platform Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your restaurant digitally

digitalMenu.title: Smart Digital Menus
digitalMenu.description: Create beautiful interactive menus with images, descriptions, and prices

whatsappOrders.title: Direct WhatsApp Orders
whatsappOrders.description: Receive orders directly via WhatsApp without complex applications

qrCode.title: Table QR Codes
qrCode.description: Custom QR codes for each table for easy menu access

realTimeUpdates.title: Real-time Updates
realTimeUpdates.description: Update menus and prices in real-time

analytics.title: Detailed Analytics
analytics.description: Track orders and most requested items

cta.title: Get Started with Digital Restaurant Platform
cta.subtitle: Comprehensive platform for managing digital restaurant menus with direct WhatsApp integration for orders

createTenantDialog.title: Add New Restaurant
createTenantDialog.description: Create a new restaurant account on the platform and set a subscription plan.
createTenantDialog.successDescription: Account for {{restaurantName}} has been created and login details sent to the owner.
createTenantDialog.genericError: An error occurred while creating the restaurant account.
